itunes:title: Joseph Smith History 1:1-26: Dr. Steven Harper: Part II
title: Joseph Smith History 1:1-26: Dr. Steven Harper: Part II
description:
Part II of this week's episode.
Dr. Harper focuses on the First Vision and touches on the four first-hand accounts. Multiple accounts of miraculous events describe a pattern throughout the scriptures (Alma the Younger, Paul, etc.).
